Package game.items

Class PowerStar

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.PowerStar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Consumable, TradableItem
public class PowerStar
extends Item
implements TradableItem, Consumable
The PowerStar class is a class that represents the item that makes Mario invincible. The PowerStar class is a subclass of the Item class and implements the TradableItem interface.
Since:
02-May-2022
Author:
Connor Gibson, Shang-Fu Tsou, Lucus Choy

    • PowerStar

      public PowerStar​(boolean portable)
      Constructor for PowerStar - takes in boolean portable, which sets the portability of the item. (any item to be traded should not be portable)
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Inform a carried Item of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the Item is being carried.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
      actor - The actor carrying this Item.

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation)
      Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the item rests upon the ground.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.

    • getAllowableActions

      public java.util.List<Action> getAllowableActions()
      Check if the PowerStar has been paired with a ConsumeAction in the ConsumableItemManager and if the PowerStar is being carried. If it has been paired, remove the ConsumeAction to ensure player cannot consume PowerStar if it is on the ground (i.e. picking up the item then dropping it should remove the ConsumeAction). Otherwise, if the PowerStar is simply being carried, add a new ConsumeAction.
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Item
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Interface method - getter for PowerStar's value.

      Returns:
      value of TradableItem
